title: High Ping in OCE servers for the last couple of months.
body: I have a 50 most of the time on speedtest.net and i used to get a 50 ping in lol, for some reason i have been getting a very high ping for the last couple of months and i am not sure why. It has been ranging from 250 ping to 480 ping. Can anyone help me in some way.

replies.body: Literally what the fuck is wrong with Riot, For the past 9 Months i've been getting a constant 900 ping and can't play the game. Every other game i play i get a solid 20 Ping but nooo League has to be a fucking Special Fuck cake, and give me 900 Ping.
I am having the same issue as well.  It's a constant 200-900+ pings regardless of map (even custom with just bots).  What is everybody's ISP just out of curiosity?

Yea, for me it is every second game or so which lags. I get like 100 extra ping but if I restart my computer or something it will go back to normal ping but when I play the second game it lags again... Also happened to me a couple patches ago but then one of the patches fixed it and now its back. QQ

Well right now my ping is 7k and I cant play

Which fukken sucks

EDIT: restarting the game just froze it
